# 🧰 DailyUtils

**A general-purpose utility Python package for daily use — perfect for everyone!**

---

## 🔧 Features

- ✅ Password generator
- 📅 Date utilities
- 🔔 Daily reminders
- 📈 Expense tracker
- 📐 Unit converters (length, weight, temperature)
- ✨ And more coming soon!

---

## 📦 Installation

```bash
pip install dailyutils
